string.name: name
string.value: The One Who Walks Down Memory Lane5
I received permission to go all the way to #m270010500#. If I want to go beyond that, I need to take a test. I should go to #b#p2140000##k to receive the test.
#p2140000# said if I want to go in further, defeat the giant Whale of Time, #r#o8220004##k, at #b#m270010500##k \n\n#o8220004# #r#a35051##k
I defeated the Whale of Time, #o8220004#. #p2140000# granted me permission. I should be able to go past Memory Lane now.
If you want to go in further, you'll need to take a harder test... Makes perfect sense, right? So what do you want? Do you want the new test?
Then go to #b#m270010500##k and defeat the #r#o8220004##k. If you defeat #o8220004#, the giant Whale of Time that lives inside the temple, I will grant you permission to go beyond that.
That's too hard for you? That's too bad then. I guess that's just your limit.
You've defeated 999 #o8200004#. That's amazing. I will grant you permission as promised.
#dAs the representative of Rhinne, the Goddess of Time, I grant you permission to go past #m270020000#, the Door of Regret, to look at your 1st regret.#k
Go on. You should be able to go up till #b#m270020100##k. As you can guess, you can't go beyond that.
You haven't defeated #r#o8220004##k yet. I don't think you are strong enough to walk against the flow of the past yet.
